channel.title: HL2 Ep2 for $2
channel.description:
Valve propose to us two days deal for Half-life 2 Episode Two. Only 2 bucks for a game. [url]https://store.steampowered.com/app/420/[/url]
I found this extremely weird. After 3 years old game why their doing sale now, in a middle of routine week, why only for two days, and why only this particular game? Discuss!

item.title: HL2 Ep2 for $2
item.dc:creator: Shepard
item.description:
RestlessMind:

I have a feeling that this might actually have something to do with Episode 3.

After all, they gave away Portal for free, and then Portal 2 came out.

It’s an obvious hint, but no one can know for sure.

Read full topic

item.title: HL2 Ep2 for $2
item.dc:creator: RandomSpoon
item.description:
Maxey:

Nah, it was just a random sale. Did you see how nothing else came out of it?

GDC Doesn’t start til the 28th

Read full topic

item.title: HL2 Ep2 for $2
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Idi:

sucky console tf2.

If they had just fixed all of the bugs that the game launched with, I would have been happy. Some of the PC content would have been awesome, but playing as a demoman and having your grenades and stickies fall through the level sucked.

this fall it will have been 4 years… so… almost 4 years.

item.title: HL2 Ep2 for $2
item.dc:creator: p.columbo
item.description:
Whatever is the reason for this, I highly doubt it has anything to do with Ep3, or HL3. It would be stupid to tease people with another greatly anticipated game, when Portal 2 is about to be released.

item.title: HL2 Ep2 for $2

item.description:
toysy123:

OFMG IZ OVIOUS SGN TAT EPISOD TREE WILL B RELLEASED TOMOZ

RandomSpoon:

My thoughts exactly.

At first, I nearly shat a brick thinking this could be related to Ep.3.

Then I realized Valve’s just trolling err’ body.

Read full topic

item.title: HL2 Ep2 for $2
item.dc:creator: doomyshadowsquirrels
item.description:
I first played the entire OB on PS3.

I was an instant fan, and it didn’t spoil the magic too badly, to be honest. Consoles are a good, trusty alternative for people with iffy computers (myself not entirely excluded). And I found the OB gave me an easy transition into PC gaming. Nuttin wrong wit consoles, IMO.

The EP3 sale’s nice, yo. I think it might actually tie-in to Portal 2, its not impossible. I first got the OB for PC their last Christmas sale, just for Valve to troll me with the New years sale… magnificent bastards.

Read full topic

item.title: HL2 Ep2 for $2
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Someonerandm:

Why would you ever buy a Valve game on a console?

No internet, computer that barely ran the HL2, no knowledge of Valve’s community or PC modding, a misconstrued idea of what gaming PCs cost since my mother always bought top of the line hardware (this is of course at a time where I did not have access to her comp or anything).

I would of course never buy a Valve game for anything but PC now but I was ignorant then.

Read full topic

item.title: HL2 Ep2 for $2
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
The 2007 engine pissed me off when it came out. I could run vanilla HL2 with max settings just fine with no (noticeable) framerate problems. Then, during the TF2 beta, I can’t play for more than 5 minutes without the game crashing on the lowest settings.

This is a good deal, though.

Read full topic

item.title: HL2 Ep2 for $2

item.description:
